summary.p: The Table Spool physical operator reads data from a temporarily created table data cache.
This operator is inserted if the query uses a recursive common table expression (CTE).
Table Spool is a physical operator.

tr.td: Specifies whether this table spool uses a stack-like fashion to read the data. If true, the execution plan will also contain an Index Spool operator that reads from the same spool. These two operators appear in recursive queries whereby the index spool operator acts as the spool producer (i.e. pushes values) and the table spool operator acts as the consumer (i.e. pops off values).
